content.name: pot
content.label: Pot
content.gloss: a container, typically rounded or cylindrical and of ceramic ware or metal, used for storage, flower or cooking. It can be a jar, vase, flowerpot, or other pots.

content.name: body
content.label: Pot Body
content.gloss: the main body for the pot

content.name: lid
content.label: Lid
content.gloss: a removable or hinged cover for the top of a container

content.name: containing_things
content.label: stuffs contained in the pot
content.gloss: the soil, liquid, food or flower contained in the pot

content.name: liquid
content.label: Liquid
content.gloss: a substance that flows freely but is of constant volume

content.name: soil
content.label: Soil
content.gloss: the upper layer of earth in which plants grow, a black or dark brown material typically consisting of a mixture of organic remains, clay, and rock particles

content.name: plant
content.label: Plant
content.gloss: a living organism of the kind exemplified by trees, shrubs, herbs, grasses, ferns, and mosses, typically growing in a permanent site

content.name: food
content.label: Food
content.gloss: any nutritious substance that people or animals eat
